ygData.subject: Re: Diana & Rion
ygData.msgSnippet: Rion: Rion snickered at Diana s description of his former instructor. Swordance DID look like a cockroach! Rion started thinking back, about all the times

From: "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@...>

Rion:

Rion snickered at Diana's description of his former instructor. Swordance 
DID look like a cockroach! Rion started thinking back, about all the times 
Diana had tried to get Swordance to teach her the combat skills he was 
supposed to learn. Sometimes the instructor did, and other times Swordance 
would start yelling in some old language only she seemed to know. Rion 
really couldn't remember what she looked like, only that she limped. That 
was why she was an instructor instead of a general. Well, that was what 
Swordance had told him when Rion asked.

Rion laughed a little when Diana made the hand motions. She never did like 
spiders! Right now though, thinking about Swordance, he really had begun to 
wonder... where they all alone here? But he wouldn't tell Diana that, nuh 
uh. Rion shook his head, as if to reasure himself. Everything was fine, and 
he knew it.

Rion followed Diana up the sandbank. There really was nothing! Well, they 
had to pick some direction, and he knew there was nothing to the east, where 
he had come from, and nothing to the west, where Diana had been:

"We may as well go that way!"

Rion pointed to the North and waited for Diana to say something.
